welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hennigsdorf, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city known for its beautiful landscapes and industrial heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to explore all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-tegel / Otto Lilienthal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-tegel / Otto Lilienthal Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
